name: Slappers Only
description: Players can only select characters that use hand-to-hand attacks. No weapons or projectiles allowed.

name: Swords Only
description: Players can only select characters who wield swords as their main means of attack.

name: Pokemon Battle
description: Players may only select Pokemon fighters. Optionally, set items to Pokeballs only.

name: I Choose You! (left)
description: Players choose the character for the person to their left. No repeats allowed.

name: I Choose You! (right)
description: Players choose the character for the person to their right. No repeats allowed.

name: Counter!
description: Players can only choose characters with counter moves.

name: Guests Only
description: Players can only choose guest characters, i.e. characters not created by Nintendo (Snake, Cloud, Sonic, etc.)

name: No Jumps
description: Players are not allowed to jump.

name: Heavyweights
description: Players may only pick bulky characters.

name: You're Special!
description: Players can only use special attacks. No normals or grabs. Jumping allowed.
